title: Business Analyst
description:
Job Title: Business Analyst

Location: Banglore

Experience: 3-5 Years

Job Responsibilities


Gather, document, and validate business requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
Analyze business processes and workflows to identify inefficiencies and improvement areas.
Collaborate with product managers, engineers, and stakeholders to align goals.
Define use cases, user stories, process flows, and wireframes.
Conduct competitive analysis, market research, and provide data-driven insights.
Monitor development progress and validate solutions with QA teams.
Analyze product performance post-launch to measure success and identify improvements.


Requirements

Must-Have:


3–5 years of experience as a business analyst in a tech or product-driven environment.
Proficiency in requirements documentation, user stories, and process flows.
Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
Experience working with cross-functional teams and tools like JIRA, Confluence, Excel, and Visio.


Nice-to-Have


Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.
Basic knowledge of SQL or BI tools.
Experience in the travel or e-commerce domain.
